file_name.title: Table name
file_name.description: Your data will be extracted to in.c-cnb-extractor.{your table name}

incremental.title: Incremental load
incremental.description: By checking this box newly extracted data will be loaded incrementally to the Storage using the 'date' and 'code' primary key. Please note that if you go later from incremental load to non-incremental your previously downloaded data will be overwritten!

current_as_today.title: Current rates as today's rates
current_as_today.description: By checking this box actual exchange rates will be considered as exchange rates for the current day (Exchange rates are declared every working day after 2.30 p.m. CET). Please use this option together with incremental load so the current rates can be updated the next day. If 'Current day (currently declared rates)' is selected in the 'Range of dates' this option will be ignored

favorite_color.title: Pick your favourite color (just for fun)
